title: A message to white supremacists
author: VD
content_html:
The One True and Confirmed Leader of the Alt-Right, Ben Shapiro, has a very important message to his fellow white supremacists everywhere. ANTIFA HAS BROKEN THE CODE!

One of the nice things about Unauthorized is that we can simply save YouTube the trouble of banning certain videos and not bother putting them up there in the first place.
